availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander C. Sowder (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Hiram Sowder and Malinda Denney Sowder. Married to Eliza J. Gentry Sowder in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on February 26, 1863. Father of Leslie L. Sowder. Attended school in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Rockcastle County in 1860. Merchant in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 178B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 461.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 5, p. 74A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 339.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 25468.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Rockcastle County Marriages, Film 000907997.
